content: Pulled this from another site, thought some of you might like to have it... --http://www.gunfacts.info/-- It covers the myths of Micro-stamping, Ballistic “fingerprinting,” Assault weapons, and 20 other chapters. Here's two chapters; all with facts such as... quote: Gun Control Proponents............76 Politicians........................76 Anti-freedom political activists...79 The media..........................81 The media in general...............82 The American government........... 82 Gun Control Opponents...........83 Send it to everyone you can think of.
